text: Bai Fan (born May 4, 1962) is a Chinese actor who has starred in various genres of film and television series. He is well known for Ren Changxia (2005), Crime Domain (2008), No 1 Landmark (2010), Beijing Love Story (2012) and Sha Mo Qing Shen Zhi Wu Yue Hua Kai etc. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
